mapper.sql: id, ccod_version, tag, app_name, alias, version, kind, params, cfgs, timeout
mapper.insert: insert into ccod_three_part_app( ccod_version, tag, app_name, alias, version, kind, params, cfgs, timeout) values ( #{ccodVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params,typeHandler=com.channelsoft.ccod.support.cmdb.dao.typeHandler.JsonMapTypeHandler}, #{cfgs,typeHandler=com.channelsoft.ccod.support.cmdb.dao.typeHandler.JsonMapTypeHandler}, #{timeout,jdbcType=INTEGER})
